meta.title: NICS Online Learning Plan: COVID-19 - North Iowa Community School

meta.content: NICS Online Learning Plan: COVID-19 - North Iowa Community School

At this time, North Iowa Schools is making preparations to complete the school year with online learning opportunities. If the North Iowa Board determines that it is safe for our students to return to school, classes will resume in Buffalo Center. Teachers will provide new content for online learning through May 15th. Students will have the option to complete unfinished assignments until May 22nd, but there will be no new assignments after May 15th. See this document for more information about online learning at North Iowa Schools: REQUIRED SCHOOL COVID-19 FAQs

article.class: post-6623 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-all-announcements category-elementary category-high-school category-home-news category-middle-school

header.div: Posted: April 8, 2020 at 8:04 PM in All Announcements Elementary High School Home News Middle School

div.p: At this time, North Iowa Schools is making preparations to complete the school year with online learning opportunities. If the North Iowa Board determines that it is safe for our students to return to school, classes will resume in Buffalo Center. Teachers will provide new content for online learning through May 15th. Students will have the option to complete unfinished assignments until May 22nd, but there will be no new assignments after May 15th.

See this document for more information about online learning at North Iowa Schools:
REQUIRED SCHOOL COVID-19 FAQs
